title: Banner (Horse)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Banner is a decorative flag made on a Banner easel in a Player-owned house with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. They can be created at 48 Crafting with 1 plank, 1 bolt of cloth, and the appropriate crest assigned by Sir Renitee.

Item ID8664

A Banner is a decorative flag made on a Banner easel in a Player-owned house with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. They can be created at 48 Crafting with 1 plank, 1 bolt of cloth, and the appropriate crest assigned by Sir Renitee.

Players must have a toy horsey in their inventory in order to have their crest symbolised as a horse. Sir Renitee will not assign a crest unless the player has over level 16 Construction. Players can use a Banner easel in another player's house if they do not have one.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The banners are among the tallest weapons in the game, about 1.75x the player's height.
  • If you try to bring a banner into Castle Wars, you get the message "You cannot take a banner into the arena."

[[File:Banner (Horse) detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''Banner''' is a decorative flag made on a [[Banner easel]] in a [[Player-owned house]] with the symbol of the mythical 'horse'. They can be created at 48 [[Crafting]] with 1 [[plank]], 1 [[bolt of cloth]], and the appropriate crest assigned by [[Sir Renitee]].

Players must have a [[toy horsey]] in their inventory in order to have their crest symbolised as a horse. Sir Renitee will not assign a crest unless the player has over level 16 [[Construction]]. Players can use a Banner easel in another player's house if they do not have one.
